data.title: Sharon Brown
data.meta_description:
Recruiting Manager | Professional Matchmaker
Whether you are looking to fill one role or one hundred, Jobot can provide you with an incredible interview-to-hire ratio....
data.text:
Over 17 years of experience in the whole recruitment cycle, talent acquisition, client management, career development and assessment. With my ability to build strong relationships, great communication skills, passion for candidate care and years of experience in sourcing, I succeed in attracting and hiring great talent.

Specialties:

• Investing in and developing world-class leaders

• Planning and executing growth

• Executing complex negotiations
